metadata.name: Cadavra
metadata.description:
A corpse has risen from the dead! Can you defeat Cadavra, a cut Repentance boss with three forms?
[img]https://i.imgur.com/R6KDzLf.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/klGiCoD.png[/img] [list] [*]Adds [b]Cadavra[/b] into the Corpse boss pool with a weight of 1 [*]Cadavra doesn't fight alone, as he can pilot [b]Nibs[/b] and [b]Chubs[/b]! [/list]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/SK84PpX.png[/img] [list] [*][u]𝐃𝐢𝐫𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐨𝐫[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/soaring__sky]Soaring_Sky[/url] [*][u]𝐂𝐨𝐝𝐞𝐫𝐬[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198353126873]RedStinger665[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/kittenchilly]kittenchilly[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198239545954]watchmeojo[/url] [*][u]𝐏𝐥𝐚𝐲𝐭𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐬[/u]= [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198353126873]RedStinger665[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198374458982/]Sillst[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198239545954]watchmeojo[/url] [/list]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/3en8OyU.png[/img] [code]Aether, Akad, BrakeDude, BroskiPlays, Firework, Gabriel, im_tem, KitsuneMedia, kittenchilly, Kotry, lambchop_is_ok, Luigi124, Michael¿?, Mr. Cross Stoney, RatRatRat, Sillst, sinbiscuit, Soaring__Sky, The Demisemihemidemisemiquaver, Thicco Catto, watchmeojo[/code]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/SlXbHql.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/xd2eafr.png[/img] [code][u]Preyn[/u] - For stylistic inspiration in the image gallery [u]NotYourSaggitarius[/u] - For the Cadavra sprites and animations [u]All of you[/u] - For checking us out and supporting us :)[/code]
